description.value: Searches on the value provided in the medication hypersensitivity identifier extension (http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-MedicationHypersensitivity.Identifier) in the following resources: * [Flag](http://hl7.org/fhir/r4/flag.html) * [AllergyIntolerance](http://hl7.org/fhir/r4/allergyintolerance.html) * [Condition](http://hl7.org/fhir/r4/condition.html) * [Observation](http://hl7.org/fhir/r4/observation.html)

purpose.value: To select the Flag, AllergyIntolerance, Condition, and Observation resources based on a specific medication hypersensitivity identifier.
